purpose: Provide developers with structured roadmaps and guides to help them learn and grow in their careers.
principle: Utilizes visual roadmaps and educational content to map out the skills and technologies developers should learn.
reusability: The roadmaps can be used as a reference for individual learning plans or integrated into educational platforms.
limitations: The roadmaps are generalized and may not cover every specific technology or career path nuance.
name: developer-roadmap
description: Interactive roadmaps, guides and other educational content to help developers grow in their careers.
highlight: Comprehensive and interactive roadmaps for developers to guide their career growth.
